def test_a_b():
    t = int(input())
    while t > 0:
        a, b, x, y, n = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
        if a == x and b == y:
            print(a*b)
            t -= 1
            continue
        if n >= (a-x) + (b-y):
            a = x
            b = y
            n -= (a-x) + (b-y)
        if n >= a-x:
            a = x
            n -= a-x
        else:
            a -= n
            n = 0
        if n >= b-y:
            b = y
            n -= b-y
        else:
            b -= n
            n = 0
        print(a*b)
        t -= 1

test_a_b()
